title: Beckn Subscriber Reference
description: A registry entry describing reference to subscription details (either whole registries or single records) created by NFOs.

subscriber_id.description: Globally unique identifier of the platform, typically an FQDN.

url.description: Specifies the DeDi lookup URL pointing to another record/registry created using the schema beckn-subscriber.

type.description: Whether the entry is referencing a Record or a Registry.
